qas.question: What notable event occurs each August?
In what month and year was the world record for simultaneous fireworks broken?
Who broke the world record for simultaneous fireworks?
What institution did Roy Lowry work for?
In what year did the Music of the Night begin?

context: Outdoor events and festivals are held including the annual <a0_0>British Firework Championships<a0_0/> in August, which attracts tens of thousands of people across the waterfront. In <a1_0>August 2006<a1_0/> the world record for the most amount of simultaneous fireworks was surpassed, by <a2_0>Roy Lowry<a2_0/> of the <a3_0>University of Plymouth<a3_0/>, over Plymouth Sound. Since <a4_0>1992<a4_0/> the Music of the Night has been performed in the Royal Citadel by the 29 Commando Regiment and local performers to raise money for local and military charities.
